sources.title: The Ghost Rider (1935) REX LEASE
sources.description:
Stars: Rex Lease, Bobby Nelson, Franklyn Farnum
Directed by: Jack Jevne

A convict escapes from a prison work farm to seek revenge on the Ozark Mountain clan that stole his ranch. Only one of two films with the Range Rider~Rough Rider brand that starred Rex Lease and Bobby Nelson.

metadata.Plot: Jim Bullard escapes from prison and returns to settle matters with the Rascob's that framed him. He kills two of them leaving an ace as his calling card. Bull remembers the deck of cards that fell when he fought Dave had no aces and the Rascob's set out after him. Trapped in a cabin, Dave receives unexpected help from Bullard.
metadata.Actors: Rex Lease, Bobby Nelson, Ann Carroll
